title: The laws of paradise, given forth by wisdom to a translated spirit.
author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.
publisher: printed, and sold by T. Sowle, near the Meeting-house in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-Street,
notes: Bound and filmed after Wing P72, J.W.P.  A letter to some divines.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
